title: B2B Source
description: This Data Type is used to capture B2B/CRM Source identifiers.

sourceType.title: Source Type
sourceType.description: Instance or Organization Id of the source data.

sourceInstanceID.title: Source Instance ID
sourceInstanceID.description: Name of the platform with the source data.

sourceID.title: Source ID
sourceID.description: Identifier of the record from the source data.

sourceKey.title: Source Key
sourceKey.description: Unique identifier composed of the sourceType, sourceInstanceId, and sourceId.
